description: React component for the login page of the Chronose application, handling email/password sign-in and sign-up, with feature flag for Microsoft SSO.

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Validates email and password inputs, including email format and password length for sign-up.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission for sign-in or sign-up, including validation, calling auth methods, and navigation.
